name: Kasm Technologies
description: The official store for Kasm supported workspaces.

workspaces.description: Chromium with AMD RX580 VA-API & GBM support

first_launch.cmd: bash -c 'apt-get update && apt-get install -y mesa-va-drivers libva-drm2 libgbm1 vainfo && mkdir -p /tmp/.X11-unix && chmod 1777 /tmp/.X11-unix && chown -R kasm-user:kasm-user /dev/dri/*'
